subject: Fund   Approved
body:
Fund   Approved
This is to let you know that the  International Monetary Fund has approved Your Fund  value,$8,500,000.00 at Veritex Community Bank USA  on your name get back to this email for more clarifications
Reply to this email address (
yellenj84@gmail.com
)
Many Thanks,
Mr. Malcolm Holland
CEO, Veritex Community Bank
USA

subject: Re: Fund   Approved
body:
Hello Mr. Malcolm Holland,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. I must say, I'm quite surprised to receive such news. Could you please provide me with more details about the approved fund? How did I become eligible for this?

Best wishes,
Amanda
